alert.note: Alert for New York (Manhattan) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 07 at 2:45AM EST until January 07 at 7:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New York, New York (Manhattan) County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Potential exists for widespread moderate to locally major coastal flooding with the Wednesday AM high tide next week in response to a strong storm system affecting the region late Tuesday into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
